input: Initiate a batch request to query account holder change requests with different lifecycle statuses and specific UUIDs.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankAccountContractAccountHolderChangeRequests?$filter=LifeCycleStatusCode eq '3' HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankAccountContractAccountHolderChangeRequests/55667788-99aa-bbcc-ddee-ff1122334455 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--
